name: Jewel Match King
description:
Switch and Match a dazzling new adventure through Jewel Match King!

Jewel Match King is a new Match-3 puzzle game created by BitMango.
With amazing Boosts and challenging levels, you will experience a never-ending fun!

Play Now

HOW TO PLAY
• Swap and Match 3 or more jewels of the same!
• Complete the level!
• Remove the jewels as much as you can!
• To get a special jewel!
• Match it to clear lots of jewel!
• Achieve 3 stars to get more coins!
• Get high score with boosters!

FEATURES
• 3 MATCH PUZZLE
- There is NO LIMIT to “STAMINA” as many of the puzzler games have.

• TONS OF UNIQUE LEVELS
- Over 300+ puzzles are unique and full of fun and amazing challenges!

• EASY AND FUN PLAY
- Easy to play interface, Just swap & match.

• NO TIME LIMIT
- Play at your own pace.

• NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM!
- Games you can play offline.


SUPPORT UNIVERSAL APP
• Enjoy the game with various devices. (Phones and Tablets)

E-MAIL
• contact@bitmango.com

HOMEPAGE
• http://www.bitmango.com/

Like us on FACEBOOK
• https://www.facebook.com/BitMangoGames


NOTES
• Jewel Match King contains the ads like banner, interstitial, video and house ads.
• Jewel Match King is free to play, but you can purchase In-app items like AD FREE and Coins


Thanks for playing!
